CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='POL',"According to the inputs provided in previous tab the number of GPON ports needed is "+ TEXT( C_VFX2_P1__c )+" . Please ensure that the sum up of GPON SFPs dimensioned in this tab corresponds with this value",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7362DF16GWNAM','To include AMS in your quote select the 3AP38518AAAA from the catalogue.', IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == 'SPS','You have decided to override default'+ BR() + 'Aerospike, Please uncheck the checkbox'+ BR() + 'above to see defaults again', IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='AirScaleWiFi',"Please fill the # of Access Points supported as "+ TEXT(Sum_of_8_Ports_POL__c)+".", IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='7362ISAMSF8GWONAR','7362 SF-8GW supports two AC powering options: Via SOOW Cable or Coax Cable. In Case of Coax cable the cable need to be sourced by the provider. Optional Mechanical Mounting kits can be selected.',IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode=='7210SAS-MXP',"Please choose you require an ETR (Extended Temperature Range) or an ETR Conformal Coated or non-ETR version.","Please select the ONT types to be supported and add their Quantity. The total quantity needs to be equal to the number of PON subscriber provided in the 'Help Me Choose'-tab"))))))
CustomField.label: Guidance
